pro1: EASYtoDO will help you to organize and manage simple and complex tasks more efficiently as well as always be aware of your tasks and keep in touch with your team. You can also use this app to organize grocery lists, personal affairs, planning your next vacation and everything else related to planning.
dev1: Responsible for backend deployment, authorization. Made Sign in and Boards pages, and also translation.
dev2: Wrote API requests service. Made the Board page and the drag'n drop function for tasks and columns.
dev3: Made the Main page, routing, Sign up and Profile pages, and also error handling.
